properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 e1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So take my heart and form it
Take my mind transform it
Take my will conform it
To Yours to Yours oh Lord

verse.name: e1
verse.lines: To Yours to Yours oh Lord (x3)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holiness holiness
Is what I long for
Holiness is what I need
Holiness holiness
Is what You want from me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Faithfulness faithfulness
Is what I long for
Faithfulness is what I need
Faithfulness faithfulness
Is what You want from me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Righteousness righteousness
Is what I long for
Righteousness is what I need
Righteousness righteousness
Is what You want from me
